channel.title: Making a webclient?
channel.description: I need any details on making a server webclient on a website. Any details will help.

item.title: Making a webclient?
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:9, topic:291192”][quote author=ownagesbot link=topic=384879.msg2891166#msg2891166 date=1248915374]

As I thought, every other posts (except in this topic) was made in the RS2 section. All 3 of you asking for help of course.

I found the topic very easily on how to make a basic webclient for an RS2 server. There’s actually quite a few topics. You 3 need to stop being lazy, and you’ve been here long enough to know that this is the RSC section. Out of all the other forums, you come to this tiny section at the bottom and ask for help. Obviously you knowingly did it to seek further assistance - but we grow tired. Seriously, stop the shit.
[/quote]We’re all tired of you but we don’t rant about it…

Good, keep your mouth shut then.[/quote]

Last post by jessekins speaks the truth.

Read full topic
